
# bash-it


## Config File Path

* [~/.config/mpv/mpv.conf](config/mpv/mpv.conf)


## Project

* [bash-it](https://github.com/Bash-it/bash-it)


## Arch Wiki

* [bash](https://archlinux.org/packages/core/x86_64/bash/)


## Howto


### install

``` sh
$ ./install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make install
```


### package-install

``` sh
$ ./package-install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make package-install
```


### config-install

``` sh
$ ./config-install.sh
```

or

``` sh
$ make config-install
```
